attributes.action: set an example, and take his family holidays at home in the UK, rather than flying abroad to the villas of pop stars and other luminaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are constantly being told that climate change is the greatest threat to mankind's continued existence on planet Earth, lectured over our 'carbon footprints' (sic), and taxed if we should dare to travel by air to visit friends and family overseas.

If the Prime Minister really subscribes to the received wisdom on climate change, in denial of the evidence from the Vostok Antarctic ice core samples that show temperature changes precede CO2 changes, he should set an example to us all and holiday at home.
